channel.title: 667/669 drop editor converted to 718
channel.description:
Kay well i finally found the famous drop editor from matrix 667 and just started converting it to a 718 anyways i need help because i have all the errors in eclipse finished and fixed but when i run my cmd file it gives me some java errors and i have no idea what to do. I'm not the best with Java directory's so i have no clue how to fix. If someone could help thanks :D
My Drop Editor CMD file
[CODE]@echo off title Drop Editor echo Started! "C:/Program Files/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/* com.rs.tools.dropEditor pause[/CODE]
THE ERROR
[CODE]Started! ERROR! THREAD NAME: AWT-EventQueue-0 java.nio.BufferUnderflowException at java.nio.Buffer.nextGetIndex(Unknown Source) at java.nio.DirectByteBuffer.getShort(Unknown Source) at com.rs.utils.NPCDrops.loadPackedNPCDrops(NPCDrops.java:63) at com.rs.utils.NPCDrops.init(NPCDrops.java:20) at com.rs.tools.dropEditor.<init>(dropEditor.java:54) at com.rs.tools.dropEditor$14.run(dropEditor.java:611) at java.awt.event.InvocationEvent.dispatch(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventQueue.access$000(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventQueue$3.run(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventQueue$3.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.security.ProtectionDomain$1.doIntersectionPrivilege(Unknown Sour ce) at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpOneEventForFilters(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForFilter(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForHierarchy(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.run(Unknown Source) Exception in thread "AWT-EventQueue-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at com.rs.utils.NPCDrops.getDropArray(NPCDrops.java:33) at com.rs.tools.dropEditor.<init>(dropEditor.java:73) at com.rs.tools.dropEditor$14.run(dropEditor.java:611) at java.awt.event.InvocationEvent.dispatch(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventQueue.access$000(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventQueue$3.run(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventQueue$3.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.security.ProtectionDomain$1.doIntersectionPrivilege(Unknown Sour ce) at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpOneEventForFilters(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForFilter(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForHierarchy(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.run(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .[/CODE]
Help is appreciated :p thanks

item.title: 667/669 drop editor converted to 718
item.dc:creator: @Sir_wootness Sir wootness
item.description:
@Sir_wootness wrote:

I think you might still need to download the libs if so then here they are hope it helps the libs folder just goes in your main class folder with your compiler and starter and such.
http://uppit.com/jnfno8upl4us/lib.rar

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @jewystrength jewystrength
